name: Gluttony (CTS_Makto)
description:
Bumbling dumb hungry sprits haunt a recently abandoned meat processing plant looking for a quick meal.  They appear to be up to something in the meat freezer and could use a hand.

WARNING: LOWER YOUR EXPECTATIONS

Gluttony was made in 48 hours  by two people for the  Shitty Horror Game Jam. So, please excuse the shitty execution. Thanks to Hederlunden for hosting the jam and good luck to the other submissions.

INSTRUCTIONS: 

Press 'E' to interact with doors, lockers and collectable objects. Use the lockers to hide from hungry bois.
